node.title: Children put at risk as Sydney gym sprayed with bullets in 'disgusting' attack
node.description: Police investigate whether a shooting that took place at a Sydney gym this morning and left one man injured was linked to the feuding Allameddine and Hamzy families.
node.content: ["Police say children were put at risk when a Sydney gym was sprayed with bullets in a targeted attack this morning.", "Police are investigating whether the shooting, that took place about 8.40am at World Gym in Prospect, is linked to the Allameddine and Hamzy families.", "Murat Gulasi was shot in the leg during the attack, and taken to Westmead Hospital where he remains in a stable condition.", "Superintendent Steve Egginton said Mr Gulasi was not cooperating with officers.", "Superintendent Egginton described the attack as \"disgusting\" and said the gym had a creche attached to it.", "\"A number of the bullets that were fired from these offenders have actually entered the gym and posted a significant danger to people inside, including children,\" he said.", "\"As we can all appreciate, innocent children [being] involved in these situations is just absolutely abhorrent.\"", "He said it was \"a little unclear\" how many offenders were involved, and that police believed those responsible were waiting for specific people to arrive at the gym.", "When asked if the shooting could be related to the ongoing feud between Sydney's Alameddine and Hamzy families, Superintendent Egginton said: \"That's one of the lines of inquiry we're looking at.\"", "Shaun Miles was working in a factory nearby and described hearing several shots.", "\"I was invoicing upstairs then I first heard two shots and then a quick six shots after and it was that loud that it shook the roller door,\" he said.", "\"Basically then everyone ran out and then we saw a station wagon drive off \u2014\u00a0I was surprise to see this happen in Australia.\"", "Sources close to the investigation claim Mr Gulasi is an associate of the Alameddines."]
